description:
IDC predicts that Android is set for significant growth in 2024, outpacing Apple’s iOS by a considerable margin. Amid shifting market dynamics, Android is expected to expand at “twice the pace” of iOS. The iPhone has always performed strongly in the US but its growth internationally has contributed to Android’s squeezed marketshare in recent years,... Read more »

The post IDC expects Android to grow at ‘twice the pace of iOS’ appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: IDC expects Android to grow at ‘twice the pace of iOS’
